scene.matchingInstructions: Match the items on the left to the correct areas on the right.

matches.match: The total area of coral reefs in a particular area is 250,000 m<sup>2</sup>.
The yearly vertical growth rate of the coral reef is 3 millimeters per year.
Calculate the total global area of coral reefs in cubic meters after one year.

scene.instructions: When you are done, check your results by clicking 'Check Answers.'

figure.text: Each person in a family of five people takes a 10-minute shower each day. The shower has a water flow rate of 5.0 gallons per minute. How much water does this family use each year to take showers?

scene.credits: (tr)Lauren Burke/Photographer's Choice RF/Getty Images, (bkgd)Image Source/Getty Images.

multiple.question: Dimensional analysis is a method of solving a mathematical equation by analyzing the metric units in the formula.
Canceling units is the final step in solving a problem.
All of the units must be the same in order to use dimensional analysis.
What should the final units be for the answer to this problem?
What should the final units be for the answer to this problem?
